channel.title: Deltascape shop problem
channel.description: [code]spawn = 2263 3017 4824 0 3021 4828 2975 4820 1 spawn = 2263 3017 4816 0 3021 4820 2975 4812 1 spawn = 2263 3020 4813 0 3024 4817 2978 4809 1 spawn = 2265 3018 4811 0 3022 4815 2976 4807 1[/code] i try to replace the coordinates with the coords of where i want the stuff to be but when i move like a shop heriqun and i compile and restart server login and my screen is blank and it loses connection so i have to reset the autospawn for him how can i move them without it doing this?

item.title: Deltascape shop problem
item.dc:creator: @mrprostats mrprostats
item.description:
@mrprostats wrote:

[quote=“grimreaper61, post:2, topic:251696”]use tabs instead of spaces. It would help if you post the error on the command prompt, but more than likely you used a space in there instead of tabbing. Its a big no no :P. Just go back and tab it and it should run fine[/quote]thanks a bunch bro

Read full topic
